equipment.name: DF-21D Anti-Ship Ballistic Missile
equipment.description: World's first anti-ship ballistic missile, capable of targeting aircraft carriers at sea.
equipment.descriptionZh: 世界首款反舰弹道导弹，能够打击海上航空母舰目标。

equipment.name: J-15 Flying Shark Carrier Fighter
equipment.description: China's carrier-based fighter aircraft, designed for operations from aircraft carriers.
equipment.descriptionZh: 中国舰载战斗机，专为航空母舰作战设计。

equipment.name: Type 99A2 Main Battle Tank
equipment.description: Enhanced version of China's main battle tank with improved armor and fire control systems, featured in 2015 parade.
equipment.descriptionZh: 中国主战坦克的增强版本，配备改进的装甲和火控系统，在2015年阅兵中亮相。

equipment.name: HQ-9 Surface-to-Air Missile System
equipment.description: Long-range surface-to-air missile system for area air defense.
equipment.descriptionZh: 远程地对空导弹系统，用于区域防空。
